Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Nik
Reviews.Content: We were a little hesitant about purchasing a refurbished camera.  We are glad that we did.  It is in perfect condition, there are no flaws or anything that we can see.  No spots on the lens when taking pictures. Overall we are very happy with this product.

Reviews.Title: Nice camera!

Reviews.Content: Love the 7d.  Great or shooting videos and photoshoots as well.  The 5d mark II & 7 d changed the game!

Reviews.Title: Outstanding build quality and layout
Reviews.Author: TomVette "TomVette"
Reviews.Content: I compared this camera to the excellent Canon 70D and opted to purchase the 7D. This camera is constructed around a die cast metal body. Though this may sound immaterial compared to the polycarbonate plastic used in most SLRs, to me it is not. This camera has an excellent balance, great weather sealing and the alignment of the body and lens is quite precise and durable.  The camera is very responsive and has a professional rated shutter mechanism and the Canon professional control layout  which is outstanding. The picture quality is superb, though the new Canon 70D is clearly superior in movie mode if that is a priority. Highly recommended.
